name: Spreedly
description: Spreedly is a cloud based credit card vault that allows you to work with one or multiple payment gateways over time or simultaneously. Dramatically reduce your PCI compliance scope, work with the world’s payment gateways and add on newer payment types like Dwolla and GoCardless.
